timeline.message: #821 trival change to kick off formatting
#821 another trival change for testing local hooks

timeline.bodyText: Still got a lot of references to D2L in here. Probably worth going through to reword comments and change identifiers - so that the different connectors don't become coupled together and hard to maintain.
timeline.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.bodyText: Ended up removing the class entirely.
replies.author: cbeach47

timeline.bodyText: Can we have more readable parameter names or  a brief description ?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang
PenghaiZhang

timeline.bodyText: Why not combine these two constants and the = into one constant?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

timeline.bodyText: May I ask why use hexadecimal numbers and what they mean?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: That came from the D2L flows, but turns out the class isn't needed for Blackboard REST.  Ended up removing the class entirely.
replies.author: cbeach47

timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: Ended up removing the class entirely.
replies.author: cbeach47

timeline.bodyText: OEQ provides tools that check strings. You can call Check.isEmpty(query) to do the check.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: not sure why we use a custom tool instead of a library that's available.  However, for this, I ended up removing the class entirely.
replies.author: cbeach47

timeline.bodyText: Can we have an example that matches this pattern ?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: Ended up removing the class entirely.
replies.author: cbeach47

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to reuse this class com.tle.web.oauth.response.ErrorResponse?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang
